Add.Name: Archive
Add.Description: Display links to older blog entries grouped by month/year.

Add.Name: BlogRenderer
Add.Description: Displays a list of the latest blog entries, blog comments and the form to post comments on a page.

Add.Name: Comments
Add.Description: Used internally by the Composite.Community.Blog.List function to handle comments in a blog.

Add.Name: TagCloud
Add.Description: Displays the tag cloud - the tags and the number of blog entries with these tags.
